code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import api from'../services/api';import{LineChart,Line,XAxis,YAxis,Tooltip,CartesianGrid}from'recharts';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MetricsDashboard=()=>{const[cpu,setCpu]=useState([]);const[memory,setMemory]=useState([]);const[latency,setLatency]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{api.get('/api/metrics/cpu').then(res=>setCpu(res.data));api.get('/api/metrics/memory').then(res=>setMemory(res.data));api.get('/api/metrics/latency').then(res=>setLatency(res.data));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"CPU Usage"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(LineChart,{width:800,height:200,data:cpu,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{dataKey:"ds"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartesianGrid,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"y",stroke:"#8884d8"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Memory Usage"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(LineChart,{width:800,height:200,data:memory,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{dataKey:"ds"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartesianGrid,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"y",stroke:"#82ca9d"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Latency"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(LineChart,{width:800,height:200,data:latency,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{dataKey:"ds"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartesianGrid,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"y",stroke:"#ff7300"})]})]});};export default MetricsDashboard;
